I usually download from BOZX or YiFy. BOZX has the movies first and highest quality, but large file size. Yify's uploads are much smaller file size, the video quality is not as great and the audio is horrible. I prefer Yifi's downloads because I can usually just turn up the volume a bit and it's fine. Unless it is a top release, then I usually go with BOZX, especially since his come online first usually. 

With this download, the quality was far superior than YiFy's 720P or 1080P rips. Probably because the file size is larger here comparatively speaking. In fact the A/V quality was close to that of BOZX and I was particularly impressed with the high decibel, clear surround sound on all surround channels. The video was also very crisp and clear. The only negative was that at times the video appeared ever so slightly stretched, perhaps due to upscaling. Also, at a couple of points in the movie, the audio was out of sync, but this is a known issue in the movie itself (as posted on the IMDB  page for this move under "goofs").

Overall, the quality is superb and I am using a 58" Panasonic Plasma and a high end Dennon receiver with Klipsh speakers. Could have easily passed for authentic 720P rip. Do not hesitate to download this one if you are waiting to see the move. Good movie too! 

A: 9
V: 7 (due to the somewhat stretched appearance only, clarity is superb)
